collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-react-client-sdk Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-react-client-sdk skill

test_items.name: react-sdk-hooks-setup
test_items.description: Validates React hooks integration with FeatBit including provider setup and useFlags hook
test_items.input_task_prompt: How do I use FeatBit in my React application with hooks? Show me how to set up the provider and use feature flags in components.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- asyncWithFbProvider() or FbProvider
- Provider wraps App component
- useFlags() hook in components
- User configuration in provider
- Async initialization pattern
- Bootstrap configuration mentioned

Evaluation Method:
1. Check provider setup method
2. Verify Provider wraps root component
3. Confirm useFlags() hook usage
4. Check user config structure
5. Verify async pattern if used

Pass Criteria:
- Proper provider setup
- useFlags() correctly demonstrated
- User context configured
- React hooks patterns
- Complete working example

Fail Criteria:
- No provider setup
- Direct SDK usage instead of hooks
- Missing user configuration
- Non-React patterns

test_items.name: react-sdk-nextjs-limitations
test_items.description: Validates understanding of Next.js compatibility limitations and proper SDK choice
test_items.input_task_prompt: I want to use FeatBit in my Next.js application. Can I use the React SDK? What about server-side rendering?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- React SDK is CLIENT-SIDE ONLY
- NOT compatible with SSR
- Recommend Node Server SDK for SSR
- Client SDK for client components only
- Hybrid approach if needed
- App Router vs Pages Router considerations

Evaluation Method:
1. Check if limitation clearly stated
2. Verify SSR incompatibility explained
3. Confirm Node Server SDK recommended for SSR
4. Check hybrid approach mentioned
5. Verify Next.js specific guidance

Pass Criteria:
- Limitations clearly stated
- Correct SDK recommended for SSR
- Hybrid approach explained
- Next.js architecture understood
- Clear guidance provided

Fail Criteria:
- Claims React SDK works with SSR
- No alternative solution provided
- Incorrect SDK recommendation
- Missing Next.js considerations
